me.soxey6.utils
Class ErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  me.soxey6.utils.ErrorHandler

public class ErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object

The class contains functions for checking errors and a list of error codes. Description of values (+/-)X(Y)YY Where: + is a recoverable error and - is an unrecoverable The X is the catagory Three y is a Warning two are errors Y define the specific error/warning.

Author:
Soxey6
